mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(s.NET_SALES), 0) FROM SALES s JOIN TRIP_PROD_LIST tpl ON s.PROD_LIST_NO = tpl.PROD_LIST_NO JOIN TRIP_PROD tp ON tpl.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE tp.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.SALE_DT, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') AND s.SETTLE_STAT_CD != '취소'

SELECT NVL(SUM(s.NET_SALES), 0) FROM SALES s JOIN TRIP_PROD_LIST tpl ON s.PROD_LIST_NO = tpl.PROD_LIST_NO JOIN TRIP_PROD tp ON tpl.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE tp.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.SALE_DT, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') AND s.SETTLE_STAT_CD != '취소'

SELECT NVL(SUM(s.NET_SALES * 0.9), 0) FROM SALES s JOIN TRIP_PROD_LIST tpl ON s.PROD_LIST_NO = tpl.PROD_LIST_NO JOIN TRIP_PROD tp ON tpl.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE tp.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.SALE_DT, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') AND s.SETTLE_STAT_CD IN ('정산대기', '정산가능')

SELECT NVL(SUM(s.NET_SALES * 0.9), 0) FROM SALES s JOIN TRIP_PROD_LIST tpl ON s.PROD_LIST_NO = tpl.PROD_LIST_NO JOIN TRIP_PROD tp ON tpl.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE tp.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.SALE_DT, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM') AND s.SETTLE_STAT_CD = '정산완료'

SELECT TO_CHAR(s.SALE_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS saleMonth, SUM(s.NET_SALES) AS monthlyTotal FROM SALES s JOIN TRIP_PROD_LIST tpl ON s.PROD_LIST_NO = tpl.PROD_LIST_NO JOIN TRIP_PROD tp ON tpl.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE tp.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND s.SETTLE_STAT_CD != '취소'
AND s.SALE_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND s.SALE_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(s.SALE_DT, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY saleMonth ASC

SELECT my_stats.MY_SALES AS netSales, my_stats.MY_RESV_CNT AS resvCount, my_stats.MY_AVG_RATING AS avgRating, my_stats.MY_REBOOKING_RATE AS rebookingRate, my_stats.MY_CANCEL_RATE AS cancelRate, avg_stats.AVG_SALES AS avgSales, avg_stats.AVG_RESV_CNT AS avgResvCount, avg_stats.AVG_RATING AS industryAvgRating, avg_stats.AVG_REBOOKING_RATE AS avgRebookingRate, avg_stats.AVG_CANCEL_RATE AS avgCancelRate, avg_stats.TOTAL_COMPANY_CNT AS totalCompanyCnt, my_stats.MY_RANK AS myRank FROM ( SELECT NVL(SUM(s.NET_SALES), 0) AS MY_SALES, COUNT(DISTINCT tpl.PROD_LIST_NO) AS MY_RESV_CNT, (SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(pr.RATING), 1), 0) FROM PROD_REVIEW pr JOIN TRIP_PROD tp2 ON pr.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp2.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE tp2.MEM_NO = #{memNo}) AS MY_AVG_RATING, 0 AS MY_REBOOKING_RATE, NVL(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN s.SETTLE_STAT_CD = '취소' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1), 0) AS MY_CANCEL_RATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM ( SELECT tp3.MEM_NO, SUM(s2.NET_SALES) AS TOTAL_SALES FROM SALES s2 JOIN TRIP_PROD_LIST tpl2 ON s2.PROD_LIST_NO = tpl2.PROD_LIST_NO JOIN TRIP_PROD tp3 ON tpl2.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp3.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE s2.SETTLE_STAT_CD != '취소'
AND s2.SALE_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND s2.SALE_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
GROUP BY tp3.MEM_NO HAVING SUM(s2.NET_SALES) > ( SELECT NVL(SUM(s3.NET_SALES), 0) FROM SALES s3 JOIN TRIP_PROD_LIST tpl3 ON s3.PROD_LIST_NO = tpl3.PROD_LIST_NO JOIN TRIP_PROD tp4 ON tpl3.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp4.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE tp4.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND s3.SETTLE_STAT_CD != '취소'
AND s3.SALE_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND s3.SALE_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
) )) AS MY_RANK FROM SALES s JOIN TRIP_PROD_LIST tpl ON s.PROD_LIST_NO = tpl.PROD_LIST_NO JOIN TRIP_PROD tp ON tpl.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE tp.MEM_NO = #{memNo}
AND s.SALE_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND s.SALE_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
) my_stats, ( SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(company_sales.TOTAL_SALES), 0), 0) AS AVG_SALES, NVL(ROUND(AVG(company_sales.RESV_CNT), 0), 0) AS AVG_RESV_CNT, NVL(ROUND(AVG(company_sales.AVG_RATING), 1), 0) AS AVG_RATING, 0 AS AVG_REBOOKING_RATE, NVL(ROUND(AVG(company_sales.CANCEL_RATE), 1), 0) AS AVG_CANCEL_RATE, COUNT(DISTINCT company_sales.MEM_NO) AS TOTAL_COMPANY_CNT FROM ( SELECT tp.MEM_NO, SUM(s.NET_SALES) AS TOTAL_SALES, COUNT(DISTINCT tpl.PROD_LIST_NO) AS RESV_CNT, (SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(pr.RATING), 1), 0) FROM PROD_REVIEW pr JOIN TRIP_PROD tp2 ON pr.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp2.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE tp2.MEM_NO = tp.MEM_NO) AS AVG_RATING, NVL(ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN s.SETTLE_STAT_CD = '취소' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 1), 0) AS CANCEL_RATE FROM SALES s JOIN TRIP_PROD_LIST tpl ON s.PROD_LIST_NO = tpl.PROD_LIST_NO JOIN TRIP_PROD tp ON tpl.TRIP_PROD_NO = tp.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE 1=1
AND s.SALE_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND s.SALE_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
GROUP BY tp.MEM_NO ) company_sales ) avg_stats
